entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches retreating to the coast. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers or drizzle. Low 6.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches spreading inland. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023
